title: Hunter Renfrow Deal, Davante Adams speaks, Who gets first Super Bowl win, NFC East questions, and Belmont Stakes
itunes:title: Hunter Renfrow Deal, Davante Adams speaks, Who gets first Super Bowl win, NFC East questions, and Belmont Stakes
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Raiders giving Hunter Renfrow a 2yr/$32 million extension.  Hosts Kyle Brandt, Will Selva, Tom Pelissero and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss surprising comments from Davante Adams about the Packers and Jordan Love.  The crew debates which player could get their first Super Bowl this season and Tom explains why it could be Matt Ryan with the Colts.  We explore the biggest question marks in the NFC East before getting the Top 5 Underrated WR's in NFL history.  We wrap up the week with Kyle's invite to The Belmont Stakes and he plans on wearing.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
